title: Orico M95SS Laptop Hard Drive Caddy for Optical Drive

cat_seo_description: Buy Laptop HDD CADDY at best price in BD. Find your laptop's secondary HDD at lowest price in Star Tech. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch.
full_description:
Orico M95SS Laptop Hard Drive Caddy for Optical Drive

The Orico M95SS Laptop Hard Drive Caddy is compatible with 2.5-inch HDD/SSD and it supports up to 2TB capacity (2000GB). It comes with a SATA revision 3.0 optical drive interface & SATA revision 3.0 hard drive interface. It is made of all aluminum material (0.6mm thickened and reinforced magnesium and aluminum alloy) and it has an oil plating surface with anti-scratch treatment. It is an applicable laptop, all-in-one PC, and server that is compatible with 9.5mm/9.2mm/9.0mm SATA. It has a dual switch and four channels, red and green LED indicator. The Orico M95SS Laptop Hard Drive Caddy has a 1-year warranty.

full_description:
Large capacity, excellent performance

Solve the problem of slow systems

If the starting speed of your laptop is very slow, then we suggest you acquire a hard drive caddy put into SSD. First, take out CD-ROM, then put the hard drive caddy equipped with hard drive into your laptop, which increases capacity of one hard drive, hoisting your laptop's speed.

Multichannel switch, more compatible

Support most of 9.5mm laptops

According to ORICO year's experience of product research and development, multichannel switch prevents part of laptops from being not compatible. Whether Lenovo, Asus, Dell, HP, Acer or IBM, laptops with 9.5mm CD-ROM optical bay are supported.

SATAIII era

Equipped with SATAIII, ORICO L95SS makes your hard drive give play to high performance, improving read-write speed.

Integrated high-quality Aluminum magnesium alloy

Ideal solution for connectivity between 2.5 inch HDD and computer.it provides stable data transfer yet is compact designed, easy to tuck it into your pocket or bring it anywhere.

Multiple protection Fix with 4 screws

L95SS is equipped with 4 screws which fix hard drive to prevent laptop from shaking inside, avoiding hard drive being damaged.

Hidden hexagonal screwdriver

With its hidden hexagonal screwdriver, you can install it any time, unplugging more smoothly.

The Orico L95SS has no warranty.
